Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.event.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LuckyYouEvent, MeteorEvent, NothingEvent, RiotEvent

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass for all events.

    • Method Detail

      • applyEffects

        public abstract java.util.List<Event> applyEffects(CityResources resources)
        Applies the effects of this event. Updates the given resources .
        Parameters:
        resources -
        Returns:
        The events that follow from the effects of this event. Must not be null, if no event results from the current one then return an empty List.

      • getMessage

        public abstract java.lang.String getMessage(LocalizedTexts texts)
        Parameters:
        texts - - text localization.
        Returns:
        Message announcing this event. Must not be null, if no message should be displayed then return an empty String.
